ABSTRACT:
this study presents the findings of a quantitative study on the use of OER based on an online survey targeted at 4 educational roles: educational policy makers, institutional policy makers, educational professionals and learners. The report advocates for building trust in OER to increase usage and to spur educational innovation through open learning architectures.
